events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but I want to request a refund because the size doesnâ€™t fit me at all and the return policy mentions this is possible.
The customer reported a refund request due to sizing issues; case labeled under Refund cluster.
Assigning case to Refund department for processing customer's refund request.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to request a refund for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and the date of purchase so I can verify the details and assist you further?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I bought the jacket on May 30th. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the information. You are eligible for a full refund. I will email you a return shipping label so you can send the jacket back free of charge.
That sounds great, thanks for the quick help. I'll send the jacket back as soon as I get the label.
We have sent the return label to your email. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be processed within 3-5 business days.
Checking in to confirm you received the return label and to see if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I received the label and have already shipped the jacket back. I appreciate your support!
Refund has been processed and the case is now closed. Thank you for contacting us, please reach out anytime.
You will shortly receive a survey to rate your satisfaction with our refund process and customer service.
